Uses of Interface
plugins.Plugin

  • Packages that use Plugin 
    Package Description
    gui
    The gui package contains all the elements that will be used to create and use the graphical user interface
    plugin
    Package of the plugin structure
    plugins
    Package of the plugins of the application

    • Uses of Plugin in gui

      Methods in gui with parameters of type Plugin 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ToolsMenu.transformTextArea(Plugin plugin)
      The method that transforms the text according to the item that have been chosen.
      Constructors in gui with parameters of type Plugin 
      Constructor and Description
      HelpItemMenu(Plugin plugin) 

    • Uses of Plugin in plugin

      Methods in plugin that return Plugin 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Plugin Convertor.convert(java.io.File filePlugin)
      Converts a file into a plugin, it's the same effect as a cast.

    • Uses of Plugin in plugins

      Classes in plugins that implement Plugin 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CesarCode
      This pluginTest applies a Cesar code to the text (ie. a shift by 1 character: 'a' into 'b', 'b' into 'c',...
      class  RemoveVowels
      This pluginTest removes all the vowels
      class  ToLowerCase
      This pluginTest transforms all the letters to lower case
      class  ToUpperCase
      This pluginTest transforms all the letters to upper case
